content: make a pile of tiny pumpkins these pumpkins are between 5/8 and 1 tall depending on how much stuffing you use and how tight you pull the tail end through the middle just like real pumpkins they easily adjust to squashed round or oblong options include a knitted stem or using found items such as twigs and coiled wire great for using up your yarn stash can be easily upsize using heavier yarns just be sure to go down a needle size from what you would normally knit with in order to keep the stuffing from showing
